start.register_prompt: To start playing, you need to register a game profile.

register.already_exists: ✅ You already have a game profile!
register.invalid_game_id: ❌ Invalid Game ID! Numbers only, minimum 8 characters.
register.game_id_taken: ❌ This Game ID is already taken!

support.title: 📞 Support
support.creator: • @username - Creator 👑
support.ready_to_help: We are always ready to help 😃!

profile.not_found: ❌ Profile not found. Use /register to register

ban.wrong_format: ❗️ Wrong format❗️ Usage: /mod_ban @username 24h reason /mod_ban 123456789 3d reason Maximum time: 7 days Time units: • m - minutes (max 1440) • h - hours (max 168) • d - days (max 7)
ban.wrong_time_format: ❗️Wrong time format❗️ Use: • 30m - 30 minutes • 24h - 24 hours • 7d - 7 days
ban.time_limit_exceeded:
❌ Time limit exceeded for moderator
Maximum: {max_minutes} minutes

warn.failed_dm: ❌ Failed to send DM notification (User blocked the bot)

unban.no_bans: User {identifier} has no active bans from you

make_admin.no_rights: ❌ You don't have rights to use this command ❌
make_admin.success: ✅ You became an administrator! Now you have access to commands: • /admin_ban - Ban user • /permaban - Permanent ban • /unban - Unban user • /banlist - Banned users list • /banhistory - Ban history • /make_moderator - Make moderator

admin_ban.wrong_format: ❗️ Wrong format❗️ Usage: /admin_ban @username 7d reason /admin_ban 123456789 30d reason Time units: • m - minutes • h - hours • d - days
admin_ban.wrong_time_format: ❗️Wrong time format❗️ Use: • 30m - 30 minutes • 24h - 24 hours • 7d - 7 days

unban.no_bans: ℹ️ User @{username} has no active bans
